name: Teeny Tiny Little World
description:
Work, sleep, socialize and fall in love.

Live day-to-day in this little world. Survive boredom, make a living working and fall in love without forgetting to sleep.

And remember: the night is dark and full of terrors!

Made for Ludum Dare 38 by:

@AleixRisco - UI/UX Artist

@Blancadesaez - 2D Artist

@DiegoDidus5 - Programmer

@Haokarlos - Game Designer
